blocks.content: Mozilla VPN gives you greater control over the types of content you see, on top of protecting your location and browsing activity.
Within the settings page, you can navigate to “Privacy Features” to see everything you’re able to do to enhance your experience.

content.content: Ad-blocking: Reduces the number of ads you see when you’re using VPN.
Tracker-blocking: Fewer harmful domains will be able to track you.
Block malware: Helps protect you from ransomware, phishing, spyware, viruses, and malware.

blocks.content: If you activate these features, they’ll overwrite any custom DNS you’re using. These protections are not a substitute for taking other security precautions — for example, while blocking malware you should still avoid downloading attachments in strange emails.
